mapper.select: SELECT CS.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID AS SUBMISSION_ID ,CS.SUBMISSION_IMAGE_ROUTE AS SUBMISSION_IMAGE ,CS.SUBMISSION_TIME ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES JOIN CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION CS ON LIKES.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID = CS.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID WHERE LIKES.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID = SUBMISSION_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT CM JOIN CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION CS ON CM.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID = CS.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID WHERE CM.CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION_ID = SUBMISSION_ID) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM CHALLENGE_SUBMISSION CS ORDER BY SUBMISSION_TIME DESC limit #{startPage} , #{endPage} ;
